review: Chromecast is awesome for what it is: Cheap and effective way to wirelessly stream entertainment to the TV. The product itself is flawless in my opionion, meaning great build quality, reliable performance and won't fail you.I use it to stream from a PC and a laptop.. so I find that an HDMI cable is almost better for me as I can stream my desktop, blu rays, etc. but it is nice to stream across longer distances.I think there are more features that could have been incorporated or that you will find in other streaming devices, but you are going to be paying a lot more than you would for Chromecast. For that reason I have given it 5 stars and would recommend this to anyone who's needs are specifically met by it.

review: The power adapter was required. This was disappointing. TV commercials ill use to the unit being self powered, or drawing power from the TV.Works we'll. One of the aspects about this adapter is the ability to stream foreign films with the English subtitles. Before this adapter I needed to stream to my computer to see the subtitles.I am not sure how to stream other programs to this unit, at this time it appears only to stream Netflics and YouTube. Maybe a future update will stream other software such as MS PowerPoint for presentations, or Facebook etc.
